snippet: What's the difference between the billionaire media mogul Mark Zuckerberg and the billionaire media mogul Rupert Murdoch, asks Bill Keller in an opinion piece in The New York Times. When Rupert invades your privacy, it's against the law. When Mark...
abstract: What's the difference between the billionaire media mogul Mark Zuckerberg and the billionaire media mogul Rupert Murdoch, asks Bill Keller in an opinion piece in The New York Times. When Rupert invades your privacy, it's against the law. When Mark does, it's the future.
